Stem: Thick, pithy, upright, branching, woody with age.
Leaves: Large 15-40 cm long, compound of 8-12 opposite pairs of leaflets, oblong and veiny with smooth edges.
Flowers: Golden yellow, in 30-60 cm long clusters of 20-40
FruitSeeds: Straight or curved cylindrical, 12-16 cm long with wings along length, with numerous flat seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Generally has more pairs of leaflets than other Senna species.
Impacts: Forms dense thickets, reduces waterway access.
